text: Asɨ 1.21 Ta 2.13, 2 Pi 3.12 agaŋ nalusaŋ mavɨn hadi hɨnihɨdi uamalɨ. Haman saja namɨlaŋ nudɨ valɨmɨlaŋ uamalɨ. Nudɨ micɨ hɨnikalaŋ uamalɨ. Haman lɨdalaŋ nalusaŋ mavɨn hadi hɨnidɨ uamalɨ. Lɨdaci Asɨ dɨ micɨ hɨnidalaŋ aludɨ Isaŋ Hadi Jisasɨ Kɨlaisɨ nalusaŋ mavɨn lama naludɨ ukaci lamɨdɨ uamalɨ. Lɨci namɨlaŋ ukaci haman laci haman laci hɨnibalɨlaŋ agasaŋ mɨhasɨsɨŋ hɨnikalaŋ uamalɨ.
